resources.string:
- sifted cake flour (400 G). 
- granulated sugar (700 G). 
- baking powder (4 TSP). 
- salt (1.5 TSP). 
- vanilla extract, divided (2 TBLSP). 
- egg yolks (8 UNIT). 
- whole milk (323 G). 
- unsalted butter, softened and cut into 1 in. cubes (961 G). 
- egg whites (6 UNIT). 
- melted and cooled bittersweet or semisweet chocolate (283 G).
Open Baking App and select a recipe, then click on widget icon next to the Ingredient.
